text: Ate jadom' manukha nu ko'i dukha pahucada hai tam uha apane raba nu pukarada hai usa vala ikagara ho ke phira jadom uha usa nu apane kolom ni'amata bakhasa dida hai tam uha isa nu bhula janda hai jisa la'i uha pahilam pukara kara riha si. Ate uha dusari'am nu alaha de barabara sarika pravana karana laga janda hai tam ki uha usa nu raha tom bhataka dena. Akho, ki tu apani avagi'a nala labha utha lai, besaka tu aga vali'am vicom hai
